content.howToPlay: We will keep the Guitar Hero's spirit alive with this game! We recommend you try the tutorial to get used to the game. There are weekly competitions that take place every Friday. And you are one of the top people in these contests. No matter what, you must win against your musical opponents as you are taking your girlfriend with you! Go on stage with confidence in your delicate ears.
content.developer: Friday Night Funkin FNF was developed by Cameron Taylor, David Brown, Isaac Garcia, and evilsk8r.

fullContent: Homeâ€º MusicFriday Night FunkinBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenÂ Friday Night Funkin is a rhythm-based music game where you compete with lively characters who are crazy for music. You must let yourself flow with the rhythm of the music playing, from nu-jazz to Vocaloid beats. Follow the on-screen musical notes and defeat your competitors in this challenging arcade game! Win your girlfriend's heart by dominating the stage.ðŸŽ¶How to Play Friday Night FunkinWe will keep the Guitar Hero's spirit alive with this game! We recommend you try the tutorial to get used to the game. There are weekly competitions that take place every Friday. And you are one of the top people in these contests. No matter what, you must win against your musical opponents as you are taking your girlfriend with you! Go on stage with confidence in your delicate ears.Catch the NotesYou must catch the flowing notes on the screen to play the music. You need to be pretty fast. Catching them won't be easy. It may even take some time to adjust yourself to the speed. Give yourself time! Each arrow sign you see corresponds to a musical note. Press the relevant arrow keys on your keyboard when the time is right!Feel the MusicThe key to achieving success in FNF is surrendering to the music. Before entering the contests, you can listen to the songs to become familiar with the rhythm. The names of the tracks are written on the left side of the week selection screen. We recommend you track your rival's notes, too. As it will help you make progress. The musical notes you see on the screen, whether your turn or the competitor's, belong entirely to one specific song.Who Are Your Opponents?You will see 6 different weekly competitions. In each of them, you will fight with another funky character. For example, your opponent in Week 1 is your girlfriend's father! You have to show him how strong you are. Otherwise, he may not let you hang out with his daughter. You can't take that risk!Week 1: Daddy DearestWeek 2: Spooky MonthWeek 3: PicoWeek 4: Mommy Must MurderWeek 5: Red SnowWeek 6: Hating Simulator FT. MoawlingControlsWASD or the Arrow Keys: Play the notes+ and the -: Increase/decrease the volume0 Number Key: MuteEnter Key: SelectESC Key: Go backDeveloperFriday Night Funkin FNF was developed by Cameron Taylor, David Brown, Isaac Garcia, and evilsk8r.More Games Like TheseIf you like playing Friday Night Funkin, you may also try Blob Opera. You get to be an orchestra chef in the game. Blobs are great singers. Lean on your fine ears to create the dream opera.For further game options, you can see all tags on OnlineGames.io by clicking on the link. If you stay tuned, you will always find new and thrilling games on the site!This article was updated on January 28, 20251 Player2DArcadeCrazyFreeHTML5MusicSkill
